derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: related to Old English piplian 'break out in pustules'

entry.def: Pimples are small raised spots, especially on the face.

example.ex: His face was covered with pimples.

means.word_mean: 1. a small inflamed elevation of the skin; a pustule or papule; common symptom in acne
